basic_info.description: We are Faded, Ink. - a unique business that combines the art of tattoos and haircuts under one roof. We believe that self-expression is a beautiful thing, and we're here to help you express yourself through your hair and body art.  We're an exclusive, referral-only establishment. That means we're so confident in the quality of our work that we let our clients do the talking for us. If you're referred by one of our satisfied customers, you'll know you're in good hands.

projects.title: Jhon
projects.description: Jhon is a full time barber and a part time tattoo artist.

projects.title: Marison
projects.description: Marison is a developer and a part time tattoo artist.

projects.title: Bryan
projects.description: Jedna z pierwszych aplikacji nad którymi pracowałam na stażu. Musiałam przygotować front-end dla aplikacji, która pokazuje modele 3D znanych budynków. To był także mój pierwszy projekt w frameworku Angular. Dużo się nauczyłam!
